## TokenExpiredError class

Thrown when a JWE token has passed its expiration time (`exp` claim).

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class TokenExpiredError extends VaultError 
```
**Extends:** [VaultError](./vaultkeeper.vaulterror.md)

[canRefresh](./vaultkeeper.tokenexpirederror.canrefresh.md)


</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Whether the token can be refreshed by calling `setup()` again. When `true`<!-- -->, the secret still exists in the backend and a new token can be issued.
